---
name: "DBC Research Ticket Template Kit - 15: After-session cleanup"
about: To guide post-research session logistical tasks. 
labels: "disability-benenfits,research" 
assignees: ''

---

### Description
This ticket covers post-research session logistical tasks to be completed for the [study name] study. The study focuses on [brief description of study]. 

#### Timeframe for this ticket
This work should fit within one sprint. However, if moderators are doing these tasks while sessions are ongoing, then the timeline for this work will depend on the number of sesions and the scheduling.

### Tasks
- [ ] Notetakers clean and scrub their notes of PII/PHI, especially if notes reside in tools and repos other than SharePoint
- [ ] Observers and notetakers share their notes with Research Lead
- [ ] Download recordings and transcripts from Zoom, change the filenames to include the P#
   - [ ] Download as or convert the transcript file to Word (.docx)
   - [ ] Sample filenames: P01-recording-2025-11-26, P01-transcript-2025-11-26
- [ ] Store recordings, transcripts, and notes in this Sharepoint location: [0 - Benefits Portfolio - General](https://dvagov.sharepoint.com/sites/vaabdvro/Shared%20Documents/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fvaabdvro%2FShared%20Documents%2F0%20%2D%20Benefits%20Portfolio%20%2D%20General&viewid=3fa7a9bb%2D3d4e%2D44c2%2Db93f%2D629268a08e72&csf=1&web=1&e=r7urXZ&CID=eb2456e3%2D0585%2D45a1%2Da0c3%2Df9e9972441bc&FolderCTID=0x01200073ECFC0A16DB51439C06C6FDC0E92947) > [Research Recordings - Veteran-Staff-VSO](https://dvagov.sharepoint.com/sites/vaabdvro/Shared%20Documents/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fvaabdvro%2FShared%20Documents%2F0%20%2D%20Benefits%20Portfolio%20%2D%20General%2FResearch%20Recordings%20%2D%20Veteran%2DStaff%2DVSO&viewid=3fa7a9bb%2D3d4e%2D44c2%2Db93f%2D629268a08e72&csf=1&web=1&e=r7urXZ&CID=eb2456e3%2D0585%2D45a1%2Da0c3%2Df9e9972441bc&FolderCTID=0x01200073ECFC0A16DB51439C06C6FDC0E92947) > [your study folder]
- [ ] Update the [Recruitment checker](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team/blob/master/teams/digital-experience/accessibility/research/RecruitmentCheckerSpreadsheet.xlsx) with participant demographics (for no-show participants, enter data as "N")
   - [ ] For additional instructions, refer to the [Inclusive Recruiting](https://depo-platform-documentation.scrollhelp.site/research-design/recruiting-participants#Recruiting-Inclusiverecruiting) section in the VA Platform documentation

### Acceptance criteria
- [ ] All Zoom files have been downloaded to SharePoint and renamed
- [ ] Notetaker and observer notes are collected in one location
- [ ] The recruitment tracker is updated
